projects.name: Logos
projects.description: A collection of brand identities and logo designs created for various clients and personal projects. Each logo represents a unique visual identity crafted to capture the essence of the brand.

projects.name: Random Designs
projects.description: An eclectic mix of experimental design work, illustrations, and creative explorations. This collection showcases versatility and creative freedom across various design disciplines.

projects.name: Sugar Packaging
projects.description: Product packaging design for a sugar brand, featuring label design, typography, and visual branding. This project demonstrates attention to consumer packaging and brand consistency.
